name: local-rag (jonfairbanks)
description: [项目级] Ingest files for retrieval augmented generation (RAG) with open-source Large Language Models (LLMs), all without 3rd parties or sensitive data leaving your network.。来源: https://github.com/jonfairbanks/local-rag

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Ingest files for retrieval augmented generation (RAG) with open-source Large Language Models (LLMs), all without 3rd parties or sensitive data leaving your network.

来源: https://github.com/jonfairbanks/local-rag
语言: Python
Stars: 730
